      • updateHistoryImage

        public static void updateHistoryImage(Image history,
                      Image mask,
                      double outOfDate)
        Update motion history image by silhouette or object mask.
        Parameters:
        history - Motion history image.
        mask - Silhouette or object mask.
        outOfDate - Out of date coefficients on motion history image. Should be in diapasone [0.0, 255.0].
